dk.statsbiblioteket.util.xml
Class XSLT

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.xml.XSLT

@QAInfo(level=NORMAL,
        state=IN_DEVELOPMENT,
        author="te")
public class XSLT
extends java.lang.Object

Helpers for transforming XML using XSLTs. All methods are Thread-safe, as long as Threads do not share the same Transformer.

Most of the helpers have an option for ifnoring XML namespace. Setting this to true strips namespaces from the input by doing a full DOM-parsing. Besides being fairly expensive in terms of processing time and temporary memory allocation, this is also a bad practice with regard to QA of the input.

Note: Transformer-errors and exceptions are thrown when they occur while warnings are logged on warnlog.

createTransformer

public static javax.xml.transform.Transformer createTransformer(java.net.URL xslt)
                                                         throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Creates a new transformer based on the given XSLTLocation.

Parameters:
xslt - the location of the XSLT.
Returns:
a Transformer based on the given XSLT.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - thrown if for some reason a Transformer could not be instantiated. This is normally due to problems with the xslt URL
See Also:
#getLocalTransformer} for reusing Transformers.

getLocalTransformer

public static javax.xml.transform.Transformer getLocalTransformer(java.net.URL xslt)
                                                           throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Create or re-use a Transformer for the given xsltLocation. The Transformer is ThreadLocal, so the method is thread-safe.

Warning: A list is maintained for all XSLTs so changes to the xslt will not be reflected. Call clearTransformerCache() to clear the list.

Parameters:
xslt - the location of the XSLT.
Returns:
a Transformer using the given XSLT.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the Transformor could not be constructed.

getLocalTransformer

public static javax.xml.transform.Transformer getLocalTransformer(java.net.URL xslt,
                                                                  java.util.Map parameters)
                                                           throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Create or re-use a Transformer for the given xsltLocation. The Transformer is ThreadLocal, so the method is thread-safe.

Warning: A list is maintained for all XSLTs so changes to the xslt will not be reflected. Call clearTransformerCache() to clear the list.

Parameters:
xslt - the location of the XSLT.
parameters - for the Transformer. The keys must be Strings. If the map is null, it will be ignored.
Returns:
a Transformer using the given XSLT.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the Transformor could not be constructed.

clearTransformerCache

public static void clearTransformerCache()
Clears the cache used by getLocalTransformer(java.net.URL). This is safe to call as it only affects performance. Clearing the cache means that changes to underlying XSLTs will be reflected and that any memory allocated for caching is freed.

Except for special cases, such as a huge number of different XSLTs, the cache should only be cleared when the underlying XSLTs are changed.

transform

public static java.lang.String transform(java.net.URL xslt,
                                         java.lang.String in)
                                  throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Requests a cached ThreadLocal Transformer and performs the transformation.

Parameters:
xslt - the location of the XSLT to use.
in - the content to transform.
Returns:
the transformed content.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the transformation failed.

transform

public static java.lang.String transform(java.net.URL xslt,
                                         java.lang.String in,
                                         boolean ignoreXMLNamespaces)
                                  throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Requests a cached ThreadLocal Transformer and performs the transformation.

Parameters:
xslt - the location of the XSLT to use.
in - the content to transform.
ignoreXMLNamespaces - if true, namespaces in the input content will be stripped. This is not recommended, but a lot of XML and XSLTs does not match namespaces correctly. Setting this to true will have an impact on performance.
Returns:
the transformed content.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the transformation failed.

                                                      byte[] in,
                                                      java.util.Map parameters)
                                               throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Requests a cached ThreadLocal Transformer and performs the transformation.

xslt - the location of the XSLT to use.
in - the content to transform.
parameters - for the Transformer. The keys must be Strings. If the map is null, it will be ignored.
Returns:
the transformed content. Note that the correct charset must be supplied to toString("charset") to get proper String results. The charset is specified by the XSLT.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if the transformation failed.
